post.text: Unbelievable - North Carolina! Thank you for the unbelievable turnout at High Point University. It is time to bring JOBS back to the United States of America! We will bring JOBS back! I AM WITH YOU - WE will MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!

comment.author: Erin
comment.text: We have 2 Trump signs in our yard and we live on one of the busiest Highways in Ohio .Thank you Mr. Trump for every thing you are doing God is with you fear not the evil doer's.

replies.author: Jaydan
replies.text: Erin, I'm saying prayers to both Jesus and Allah that you will soon move away from that busy highway. The diesel exhaust is rotting your brain! :)

replies.author: Erin
replies.text: Thank you, Scally Wag so funny ha!

replies.author: Taylor
replies.text: Jaydan oh look Jaydan is an Internet troll.
